Title: Relates to establishing a cause of action for medical monitoring
Summary: Establishes a cause of action for medical monitoring for a person with or without a present injury or disease; establishes a statute of limitation for such cause of action.
LawCode: Add ยง37-0116, En Con L; add ยง214-i, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to establishing a cause of action for medical monitoring
